Horoscopes

VII

Aries: You are discovered. If you leave before midnight, you can evade arrest.

Taurus: You may have been feeling a little unhappy recently, Taurus. Don't panic. One day you'll find your way out of the Wellington sewers.

Gemini: The warden could use your accountancy skills. Make yourself useful to him. It will be your key to escape.

Cancer: Next time you're up on the roof, clean the ghosts out of the gutter

Leo: The circle of blood has been drawn. The bloodstones mark a pentagram. Be patient. The time of the ritual is nearly here.

Virgo: You will find yourself in a test chamber that is impossible to solve. Don't even bother trying.

Lesnac: Just because they're out to get you, doesn't mean that you should be paranoid.

Scorpio: Alright, chief. Your first case is a murder.

Spaghetti: Violence is the answer to question 4b

Capsicum: You will remember something embarrasing you did when you were younger. You will comfort yourself in the knowledge that you're probably the only person who remembers it. You're not. They still laugh about it behind your back.

Aquarius: You have a real attitude problem, Aquarius. Clean up your act. If you're late to school once more, you'll get a detention

Pisces: Lighters now litter your bedroom floor. You are being too obvious. If you don't want to attract attention, keep them hidden.
